title: Development and evaluation of a duplex real-time multienzyme isothermal rapid amplification assay for the detection of hypervirulent Klebsiella pneumoniae in clinical spiked blood specimens
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Zhixiong Duan, Shan Wang, Niqi Xie, Junying Zhao, Jian Dong, Jin Li
